name: The Hidalgo Colega
description:
Inmerse yourself in the endless fields of La Mancha, dealing with the heroic task found by the Hidalgo.  The giants. Be careful in the battle, the hidalgo is an old man, skillful, but still old. 

===CONTROLS===================================================

W A S D -> Movement.

Left Click (Hold & Release) -> Attack

Q -> Dash

SPACEBAR -> Jump

===============================================================

If for whatever reason the newest build is not working, download "The Hidalgo Colega"

===============================================================
